text: Arra koso wa, maruyamu no ko masu~ifudearu.' To iu mono wa, tashikani fushinjin-shadearu. Shikamo masu~ifu wa itta nodearu. `Isuraeru no shison yo, watashi no omodeari, anata gata no omode ara reru arra ni tsukae nasai.' Oyoso arra ni nanimono ka o haisuru mono ni wa, arra wa rakuen (ni hairu koto) o kinji rare, kare no sumai wa gokadearu. Fugi o okonau mono ni wa enjo-sha wa nai nodearu
